About the Company: Gujarat Ambuja Exports Ltd is involved in agro-processing and trading and has focused on exports, competing in the global market.The company is one of Indias major manufacturers and exporters of the below:Edible Oil  Refined Soya Bean Oil, Refined Palm Oil, Refined RBD Palmoline and Refined Cotton Seed,Starch and Derivatives - Malto Dextrin, Malto Dextrin, Dextrin, Dextrose Monohydrate, Sorbital, Maize Starch and Liquid Glucose,Defatted Soya Flour - Toasted and Un-Toasted,Full Fat Soya Flour  Active, Inactive and Feed Grade,Soya Flakes - Toasted and Un-Toasted,Cotton Yarn,Deoiled Cakes,Vanaspati Ghee,Bakery Shortening,Wheat Flour,Cattle Feed,Soya Lecithin,Indian Soyabean Meal,Indian Soyabean Hulls,Rapeseed Meal Deoiled Extractions and Rapeseed Lecithin.
